channel.title: Pyrithion on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Pyrithion on Chaotic Online

item.title: A Fearsome Fate
item.description: In the previous episodes, Tom finally got a new scan of his favorite Creature, Maxxor, but when he used it for the first time in battle he realizes that something is wrong.

item.title: Chaotikings
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz’s initiation in the most famous “club” in Chaotic… or not.

item.title: Colosseum Showdown
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a little misunderstanding end up in an epic way in the best Real Steel style

item.title: Crash Course
item.description: In this episode, Kaz faces Klay in a dispute while Tom tries to get the scan of a lunatic Creature whose life is playing tricks.

item.title: Everything's in Flux
item.description: In this episode we’ll know a little more about Krystella, a player as unprincipled as Klay that does everything, no matter what, to succeed or to prevent those who cross her path to succeed themselves.

item.title: Fire Fighters
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a hot fight, literally, in which both players will try to prove their own superiority as well as of one of of the Four Elements.

item.title: Out in the Cold
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz’s journey through a dangerous path, with an unusual guidance, to the aid of the reclusive Raimusa in the Crystal Range.

item.title: Over-Under Rent Asunder
item.description: The ancient war between Good vs. Evil in the Chaotic universe: OverWorld vs. UnderWorld.
